mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity_account (user_id, activity_id, total_allocate, total_surplus, day_allocate, day_surplus, month_allocate, month_surplus) VALUES (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{totalAllocate}, #{totalSurplus}, #{dayAllocate}, #{daySurplus}, #{monthAllocate}, #{monthSurplus});
mapper.update: UPDATE activity_account SET total_allocate = total_allocate + #{totalAllocate}, total_surplus = total_surplus + #{totalSurplus}, day_allocate = day_allocate + #{dayAllocate}, day_surplus = day_surplus + #{daySurplus}, month_allocate = month_allocate + #{monthAllocate}, month_surplus = month_surplus + #{monthSurplus} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND activity_id = #{activityId};
UPDATE activity_account SET total_surplus = total_surplus - 1, day_surplus = day_surplus - 1, month_surplus = month_surplus - 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND activity_id = #{activityId};
